api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Freshdesk API Key. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

requests_per_minute.title: Requests per minute
requests_per_minute.description: The number of the requests per minute that this source allowed to use.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time. Any data created after this date will be replicated. If this date is not set, the connector replicates data from 1 year ago by default.
